all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
Therefore shall a man leave his father and his mother, and shall cleave unto his wife: and they shall be one flesh.
Genesis 2:24
Quote of the Day
"The counsel “look to God and live” not only has meaning for us in eternity but also makes all the difference in … our mortal lives."
President D. Todd Christofferson | 1 Oct 2025General Conference
